title: shared files are not decrypted
body:
**expected behaviour**

when sharing files to other users the file is decrypted

**actual behaviour**

when sharing files to other users the file is encrypted

**steps to reproduce**

logon with a user encrypt a file and share it with a group. log in with another user download the shared file - the file is still encrytped. 

**log**


error 

encryption library 

decryption (asymmetric) of sealed content with share-key "" failed 

2013-09-25t08:27:59+00:00 



error 

encryption library 

decryption (asymmetric) of sealed content with share-key "" failed 

2013-09-25t08:28:33+00:00 



error 

encryption library 

decryption (asymmetric) of sealed content with share-key "" failed 

2013-09-25t08:29:04+00:00 



warning

encryption library

sharing to these user(s) failed as they are unready for encryption:"array ( [0] => a8928d60-789f-44bc-afcd-2ba8405beecf )
 
2013-09-25t08:26:29+00:00



warning

encryption library

"a8928d60-789f-44bc-afcd-2ba8405beecf" is not setup for encryption

2013-09-25t08:26:29+00:00


**server configuration**

operating system: windows server 2008 r2

web server: iis

database: mysql

php version: 5.4.19

owncloud version:5.0.11



i have tried to delete all cookies before logging in with another user. also unselected the checkbox "remember passwort".
